SPEND AN UNFORGETTABLE HOLIDAY IN A CHALET-HOTEL IN SWITZERLAND

Surrounded by the Alps , green meadows , towering cliffs and amidst the ancient tradition and genuine Swiss culture is romantic Adelboden Hotel Beau Boutique This luxury boutique hotel has 36 rooms, a beautiful restaurant with traditional cuisine and a spa and fitness area. In recent years it has become one of the best hotels in Adelboden , and even in the Bernese Oberland. The hotel offers a very special combination of traditional chalet spirit and modern comforts of a four star country house style.

trans-unit.note: Titre pour la descriptiond des chambres
numéro de téléphone ne respectant pas l'indicatif suisse

trans-unit.source: Set off on two wheels and you are quickly heading for a completely new mountain experience. Experienced professionals, practice areas, and rental equipment are available to ensure you get the best possible start. Mountain bikers and seasoned cyclists have long been riding the challenging trails and long leisurely distances in the great outdoors.

Where better to broaden your horizons than in the Bernese Alps? The view sweeps serenely over peaks and gorges, and the longing to take big steps into the unknown increases.Planned hikes are also an option as there is no shortage of longer tours and places to stay along your chosen route.
During the summer holidays open daily from 11 a.m.to 4 p.m.!

Swing through the air like Tarzan, let your adrenaline rush when abseiling from a bridge, glide over the river at top speed on a cable car and, last but not least, dare a huge pendulum swing? This is what awaits you in the Adventure Park - Adelboden.
If you like action, explore the impressive alpine world with a scooter.The mile - long, varied routes are waiting to be discovered.
Paragliding in all its facets.We offer you a wide range of airy experiences, from simple adventure flights to full - day paragliding adventures.

Legendary architecture with panoramic views.Under the alpine sun, the water of the 50 - metre Gruebi pool glistens seductively.On the other hand, when the sky is grey, a trip to indoor swimming pools at the Sportzentrum in Frutigen is a great alternative.

A warm welcome to our little paradise in the midst of the Kandertal mountains.The Blausee brand stands for uniqueness from start to finish.Hospitality is part of our mission so you can indulge all your senses with us.The Blausee is considered a place of power - one where you can relax and enjoy nature at its best.

concentration, a head for heights and physical strength are all needed when you are moving in a vertical direction.However, the right equipment is just as crucial for visitors when climbing.Fortunately, the mountain guides and climbing supervisors at Adelboden - Lenk - Kandersteg have well - padded mats, deeply anchored hooks and tightly stretched ropes to hand.This allows you to practise manoeuvres and enjoy views that would otherwise only be possible for expert climbers on high alpine tours.

Adelboden - Lenk has earned its reputation as a top ski resort over many decades.Events like the Ski World Cup at Chuenisbärgli or the professional services offered by the snowsports schools are now well - respected winter institutions.But alpine winter traditions are lived very much in the present.Specialist teams prepare the various slopes with great care each day

"The joy is in having the time to forget time..." ... and limitless freedom to enjoy under the professional supervision of our sports instructors.It's a fantastic feeling making those first tracks in deep, freshly fallen snow. Experience a pure, natural world far from the heavy traffic on the piste and in no time the stresses of everyday life will seem miles away. Activities and prices are based on those for individual tuition.
Snowshoeing is one of the many traditions, still cultivated in Adelboden. Discover peaceful and secluded corners, far away from the crowds.

Immerse yourself in a world of icicles. What could be cooler than a frozen waterfall? Ice climbing, the fascinating sport in the world of waterfalls and icicles. Here we show you how to move safely in the ice.
Please remain seated. In Adelboden, sledge runners are certainly a match for skis. Dozens of miles of trails carry riders through forests and over icing-sugar-coated meadows.

trans-unit.source: We don't provide a la carte menu yet.
The halfboard is only available on demand
Your review has been registered and will be checked before publication.

We are pleased to receive your feedback, suggestions, and constructive criticism. You are welcome to share your observations with us directly on-site. Consequently, we can respond accordingly. Thank you very much for taking the time to give us feedback so that we can continuously improve. We value your opinion and welcome your suggestions.

trans-unit.source: Or feel free to review us on
The Basic double rooms have a small terrace, some with a view of the mountains.
These rooms have a balcony facing the village street, with a view of the Tschentenalp.
These rooms have a balcony facing east, some with a view of the mountains. They are also suitable as triple rooms, with a sofa bed.
These rooms have a wonderful view of the Adelboden mountain panorama. On the balcony you can enjoy the view to the Bunderspitz over the Lohnermassiv to the Wildstrubel and the Engstligen Falls.
These rooms are very suitable for families. They have a gallery with a double bed and are ideal for four people. The balcony faces north towards the village street with a view of the Tschentenalp.

We are a motivated and dedicated international team looking forward to offering you an exceptional stay in our hotel and restaurant. We are happy about good-humored guests and are always ready to give our best for you. We look forward to getting to know each other soon!
Choose the plan that fits your needs.
Suspend your subscription for free (from 7 to 90 days/year)
Special reduction with guest card. 15 CHF instead of 20 CHF
Are you recommanding us? Get a free month for each new subscriber

Enjoy various offers in our container wellness oasis. Our spa has a sauna, a sanarium, a steam bath, an infrared sauna and a spacious relaxation room with a wonderful mountain view where you can relax.

Take a sauna in our cosy barrel sauna, which is located in the outdoor area. After a dip in the cold water pool or the cold water shower, you can enjoy the peace and quiet in the adjacent relaxation room.
Book a soothing massage and let our masseuses pamper you. Book the appointment early enough, so that it also works out safely with us.
In the spacious relaxation room you can relax, read a book or enjoy the view of the wonderful Adelboden mountain panorama.
